mapper.select: select channel_id , feed_cat_path , feed_prop_origin , feed_prop_translate from voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_feed_custom_prop_value where channel_id = #{channel_id} and feed_cat_path = '0' order by feed_cat_path

select channel_id , feed_cat_path , feed_prop_origin , feed_prop_translate from voyageone_cms2.cms_bt_feed_custom_prop_value where channel_id = #{channel_id} and feed_cat_path != '0' order by feed_cat_path
